'''''Poems by J.R.R. Tolkien: Volume I-III''''' is a 3 volume set issued in a slipcase, containing a selection of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poetry from ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]''.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref> The books feature drawings by Tolkien, coloured by [[H.E. Riddett]].
